prompt: Macro photograph capturing the bases of three different antique glass bottles (aqua, amber, clear) arranged horizontally on a weathered wooden surface. Focus is sharp on the distinct identification marks: a rough pontil scar on one, an embossed maker's mark (e.g., 'HGW Co.') on another, and Owens ring scar on the third. Dramatic side lighting casts long shadows, highlighting the textures and imperfections in the glass and wood. Shallow depth of field blurs the background. Photorealistic style, detailed texture. --ar 16:9
name: old-bottle-identification-marks-image-1.png

prompt: A horizontal lineup of five diverse antique bottles (medicine, soda, ink) standing on a dusty antique shop shelf, viewed slightly from below. The focus is razor-sharp on the embossed lettering and pictorial logos ('Dr. Kilmer's Swamp Root', 'Coca-Cola script', an eagle emblem) visible on the sides. Soft, diffused natural light streams from a nearby window, illuminating the varied glass colors and shapes. Professional photograph, vintage aesthetic, shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9
name: old-bottle-identification-marks-image-2.png

prompt: Extreme close-up, horizontally composed image comparing the distinct finishes of three old bottle necks against a clean, neutral grey backdrop. Left: a crude, uneven applied lip. Center: a smoother, tooled lip with visible striations. Right: a uniform, sharp machine-made lip. Bright, clean studio lighting precisely highlights the glass texture, color variations, and the presence or absence of seams near the top. Hyperrealistic, educational style. --ar 16:9
name: old-bottle-identification-marks-image-3.png

prompt: Dramatic side-lit photograph of a single, clear antique flask lying horizontally on dark, textured fabric. A strong beam of light illuminates a prominent vertical mold seam running the length of the bottle's side and neck, clearly showing where it stops below the lip. Macro detail emphasizes the glass texture and the slight ridge of the seam. Dark, moody atmosphere with high contrast. Photorealistic, sharp focus. --ar 16:9
name: old-bottle-identification-marks-image-4.png

prompt: Overhead wide-angle shot of a historian's cluttered wooden desk. Centered horizontally, hands wearing white cotton gloves carefully hold an unearthed, dark olive green 18th-century wine bottle, tilting it under a focused desk lamp to examine a faint glass seal mark on the shoulder with a large magnifying glass. Surrounding the bottle are calipers, research notes, and small brushes. Warm, intimate lighting, scholarly atmosphere, photorealistic detail. --ar 16:9
name: old-bottle-identification-marks-image-5.png
